title: Roses in Winter
description: A second chance romance that will touch your heart. A beautiful emotional journey of two people destined to love. Meet Riley's horses. Visit northern Montana. See inside the moments that change us forever. Find the courage to love again.Riley and Savannah loved each other their whole lives. He vowed to marry that beautiful talented woman. Montana was their home. Life in the northern mountains is hard, but her love made him strong. But life had other plans for Savannah. Her music was a gift, a beautiful part of her soul. The piano took her far away from Riley. Love was never forgotten. Savannah hoped for second chances.Seven years later in upstate New York, a terrible car accident steals the life of their son, a child Savannah believed was a secret. But Riley knew. He chose to let Ryan live in her magical musical world, a place he felt their son deserved.He still loves Savannah. Now the good is gone. Her music died with RyanSavannah Graystone is coming home. But she doesn't want to live without Ryan. Battered and bruised, she just wants to die too. But Riley is there. He saves her. They both made choices, both have regret. But she gives him a gift: a video diary of their son. She had recorded every day of Ryan's life, hoping someday they could be a family.The road to healing a broken heart is a difficult journey. Sometimes forgiving yourself is the hardest thing of all.But real love will find a way through the darkest storm.~~ FOREVER ISN'T LONG ENOUGH, NOT FOR HOW MUCH I LOVE YOU.
author: Leslie D. Stuart
